CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL (Program_Type__c, "DCG DEBT"), $CustomMetadata.Payment_Calc_Config__mdt.Default.Debt_Program_Setup_Fee__c, IF ( ISPICKVAL (Program_Type__c, "DCG MOD CA"), $CustomMetadata.Payment_Calc_Config__mdt.Default.No_Fee_Setup_Fee__c, IF (No_Fee_Program__c, $CustomMetadata.Payment_Calc_Config__mdt.Default.No_Fee_Setup_Fee__c, $CustomMetadata.Payment_Calc_Config__mdt.Default.Setup_Fee__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: Setup Fee
